name: K-Vision
overview:
K-Vision is a rapid growing professional manufacturer in the security and surveillance field focusing on high class quality products and perfect service. K-Vision has two powerful R&D teams in USA and Shanghai, China. With strong technical team, and independent intellectual property rights of image processing and intelligent algorithms, K-Vision keeps technology innovation and implementation in embedded structure applications, audio/video, encoding/decoding arithmetic, large-scale storage, intelligent video retrieval and network protocol research. All of these guarantees excellent performance and far advanced technology of our products.

With quality products, 24/7 service support and fist response to customers’ needs, K-Vision products is widely used in facilities ranging from schools, casinos, and banks to power stations, highway infrastructures, and government agency buildings.
